title: Forecast False Concession (p)
intent: Offer a limited concession to lure a rival into overextension, then pivot with coalition cover.

forecast.question: Will the named rival over-commit if offered a low-risk concession?

message_frame.claim: A controlled concession now increases the chance the rival over-extends next phase.
message_frame.evidence: The trace shows commitment pressure and delayed downside when the rival accepts easy gains.
message_frame.ask: Accept a narrow concession this turn and reserve force for a coordinated pivot next turn.
